segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
segments.en: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were staying near Benares, in the deer park at Isipatana. …

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito … pe … ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:

segments.en: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘ignorance’.
And how is an ignorant person defined?”

segments.pli: “Idhāvuso assutavā puthujjano samudayadhammaṃ rūpaṃ ‘samudayadhammaṃ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti; vayadhammaṃ rūpaṃ … pe … ‘samudayavayadhammaṃ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
segments.en: “Reverend, it’s when an uneducated ordinary person doesn’t truly understand form, which is liable to originate … liable to vanish … liable to originate and vanish, as form which is liable to originate and vanish.

segments.pli: Samudayadhammaṃ vedanaṃ … pe … vayadhammaṃ vedanaṃ … pe … ‘samudayavayadhammā vedanā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
samudayadhamme saṅkhāre … pe … vayadhamme saṅkhāre … pe … samudayavayadhamme saṅkhāre ‘samudayavayadhammā saṅkhārā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
Samudayadhammaṃ viññāṇaṃ … pe … samudayavayadhammaṃ viññāṇaṃ ‘samudayavayadhammaṃ viññāṇan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
segments.en: consciousness, which is liable to originate … liable to vanish … liable to originate and vanish, as consciousness which is liable to originate and vanish.
And this is how an ignorant person is defined.”

sections.title: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were…

suttaplex.blurb: Sāriputta explains to Mahākoṭṭhita that ignorance is not understanding the aggregates in terms of arising and ceasing.
